select b.dat, to_char(b.dat, 'DY') as day, nvl(a.cnt, 0) as cnt, nvl(total, 0) as price from ( select to_char(odr_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as odt, count(*) cnt, sum(odr_total_price) as total from order_tbl where odr_date between to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by to_char(odr_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) a , ( select to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + level - 1 as dat from dual connect by level <= (to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b where b.dat = a.odt(+) order by b.dat

select count(*) chart_count, sum(odr_total_price) chart_price, to_char(odr_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') chart_date from order_tbl where odr_date between TRUNC(sysdate , 'd') and TRUNC(sysdate , 'd')+6 group by to_char(odr_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') order by to_char(odr_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
